scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && echo Migration
scripts.migrate-seeds: cd server && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && echo Migration + seeds
scripts.undo: cd server && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && echo banco reiniciado
